amendment.description: To ensure that every motor carrier entering the United States through the cross-border motor carrier demonstration program is inspected and meets all applicable safety standards established for United States commercial motor vehicles.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2842 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 29 - 69. Record Vote Number: 332.

action.text: Amendment SA 2842 proposed by Senator Cornyn. (consideration: CR S11390-11393, S11394; text: CR S11390) To ensure that every motor carrier entering the United States through the cross-border motor carrier demonstration program is inspected and meets all applicable safety standards established for United States commercial motor vehicles.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2842 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 29 - 69. Record Vote Number: 332.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2842 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 29 - 69. Record Vote Number: 332.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2842 proposed by Senator Cornyn.
